translations: n.种类；程度；品质（sort 的复数）
v.把……分类，整理；区分（sort 的第三人称单数）；挑选

sentences.sentence: It was used by all sorts of people.
There are many different sorts of animal on the island.
sentences.translation: 岛上有许多不同种类的动物。

sentences.sentence: He offered us an apology of sorts.
sentences.translation: 他给我们勉强道了个歉。
